function.name: deviceState_getSupportedModes
function.description: This function is used to inquire about the available modes of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to inquire about the supported modes.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to inquire about the supported modes.
